plot outline: Sreeram is a principled chap with an inclination towards politics. With an altruistic attitude he goes out of the way to help others. Seeta is a girl who does not want to confine to home and wants to live independently as an entrepreneur. Sreeram is seriously fascinated by Raji and wants to marry her. But she feels that he is not her kind of guy. Raji's parents settle her marriage with an IPS officer. Seeta meets Sreeram and his relatives on their boat journey from Rajahmundry to Bhadrachalam. The rest of the story is all about how Sreeram and Seeta realize how perfect they are to each other.
title: Godavari
plot: While on a cruise on the river _Godavari_ (qv), a romance ensues between a heartbroken idealist Ram and an independent woman, Sita

Sreeram is a principled chap with an inclination towards politics. With an altruistic attitude he goes out of the way to help others. Seeta is a girl who does not want to confine to home and wants to live independently as an entrepreneur. Sreeram is seriously fascinated by Raji and wants to marry her. But she feels that he is not her kind of guy. Raji's parents settle her marriage with an IPS officer. Seeta meets Sreeram and his relatives on their boat journey from Rajahmundry to Bhadrachalam. The rest of the story is all about how Sreeram and Seeta realize how perfect they are to each other.::Anonymous
